# excluding(categories)

**Static Method**

A list of categories to exclude from a search.

## Declaration

```swift
static excluding(categories: AddressCategory[]): AddressFilter;
```

## Creating filters

- **including(categories)**: A list of categories to include in a search.
- **excludingAllCategories**: A value that excludes all address categories.
- **includingAllCategories**: A value that includes all address categories.

items.description: A list of categories to include in a search.

items.description: A value that excludes all address categories.
